title: Soft hued paint accented with white paneled doors
posting_body: ['Virtual and Contact-Free Leasing and Move-In Available', '- Self-Guided Tours with Lockboxes', '- FaceTime/Skype Tours', '- Apply & Sign Online', 'Welcome to Maple Grove Apartments', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 66', 'OR Text', '66', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 1000 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Spacious living areas, updated furnishings, and energy efficient appliances are what you’ll find in our one- or two-bedroom floor plans.', 'Maple Grove offers comfort, affordability and convenience in one beautifully manicured, tranquil community.', 'In-home amenities like individually controlled AC and heat, walk-in closets and beautifully designed kitchens with oak cabinetry are just a few of the benefits of living in Maple Grove of Sterling Heights.', 'Features:', 'Brick buildings and traditional architecture, Dishwashers available in select homes, Soft hued paint accented with white paneled doors, Controlled Access to Building, Accent walls in living area of apartment home, Beautifully designed kitchen featuring oak cabinetry, GE white appliances and dark walnut vinyl plank flooring, Gas range in all apartment homes, Updated lighting throughout the apartment home, Large picture windows fitted with designer selected blinds, Common laundry room with full size GE wash and dryer, Walk-in closets, Satin nickel hardware throughout residence, Resident storage located on-site, Well-designed floor plans ranging from 800 to 1000 square feet, Spacious living room and bedrooms featuring plush neutral carpet', 'Community Amenities:', 'Easy access to shopping, Beautifully designed outdoor swimming pool and expansive pool deck, On-site management, 24-hour Maintenance Response Guarantee, On-line Resident Portal (see Resident Services tab), Pet friendly - cats and dogs- limited dog approved buildings and restricted breeds do apply., Professionally landscaped, Easy access to freeways, Exercise room with flat screen television, Common laundry room with full size GE wash and dryer', 'Pet Policy', 'Dogs allowed in limited buildings', 'Breed restrictions do apply', '$200 security deposit / $100 refundable after move out', '$30 monthly pet fee', 'Cats - $20 monthly pet fee', '$200 security deposit / $100 refundable after move out', 'Income Requirements:', 'Two and a half times the rent', '30 days of most recent income pay stubs', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 't0nunJ82UG']
